scenes.background: Monica takes a deep breath and sits back down, trying to compose herself. Bob leans against the desk, looking irritated.
scenes.description: 'Maybe we do need to rethink our process. What do you both think?'

options.text: It's a good idea. Let's have a brainstorming session later.
options.analysis: You suggested a collaborative solution, showing good self-regulation and motivation, though perception and empathy were moderate.

options.text: We need to stick to the plan. Changing now would cause more confusion.
options.analysis: You focused on maintaining the current plan, demonstrating strong social skills but lower empathy and motivation to adapt.

options.text: I'm not sure. Maybe we need more input before deciding.
options.analysis: You suggested seeking more input, showing good perception but lower motivation and self-regulation.
